Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,

 First started playing KSP back in 2013 and just happened to remember I bought it when it was only like $20. So, hoping I could redownload it, I got on and sure enough, we were all set. As an aircraft Mechanic by trade, I enjoy planes mostly (for reasons lol), however I dabble in rockets from time to time. Looking to connect and further the fun through these forums, so, feel free to message me!

-Bryce

Welcome aboard @Kerbal_Mechanic!

I've taken the liberty of moving your thread over to our Welcome Aboard section, hope you have many successful flights.
